soldiers are tricky cuz they always run around real fast and stuff.

if i can't control 'em, i'd probably say none at all and just devote 
my funds to the character i had. if i had to choose one, i'd either 
say slime or druid. slime because once they start splitting, they 
make a sweet barrier between the badguys and a projectile guy (like a 
mage). druids are good because if i can get them breathing room, they 
can get me protection and fairies and whatnot.

i still like the single character thing though.
